channel.title: Comments on: Quiet Desperation
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description:
I'll trade you...
I have a horrible case of atopic dermatitis, which is short for "wanting to remove your skin with a very sharp knife"...
I just did my laundry. No matter what, there are always things that need cleaned...
item.content:encoded:
I’ll trade you…

I have a horrible case of atopic dermatitis, which is short for “wanting to remove your skin with a very sharp knife”…

I just did my laundry. No matter what, there are always things that need cleaned…

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: wow, you got your laundry done? you must be doing better than you thought ;) someone once told me you must first get really lost before you can find yourself.
item.content:encoded: wow, you got your laundry done? you must be doing better than you thought ðŸ˜‰ someone once told me you must first get really lost before you can find yourself.

item.content:encoded:
And here are the lyrics

Revelation
words by Mac Powell / music by Third Day

My life has led me down the road thatâ€™s so uncertain
Now I am left alone and I am broken
Trying to find my way
Trying to find the faith thatâ€™s gone

This time I know that you are holding all the answers
Iâ€™m tired of losing hope and taking chances
On roads that never seem
To be the ones that bring me home

Give me a revelation
Show me what to do
â€˜Cause Iâ€™ve been trying to find my way
I havenâ€™t got a clue
Tell me should I stay here
Or do I need to move
Give me a revelation
Iâ€™ve got nothing without you
Iâ€™ve got nothing without you

My life has led me down this path thatâ€™s ever winding
Through every twist and turn, Iâ€™m always finding
That I am lost again
Tell me when this road will ever end

I donâ€™t know where I can turn
Tell me, when will I learn
Wonâ€™t you show me where I need to go
Let me follow your lead
I know that itâ€™s the only way that I can get back home
